sense.def: Pathological Condition of a dian xian 癲癇 , peak-illness with epilepsy, which, at the time of its outbreaks, makes the patient’s four limbs twitch, accompanied by a shaking headand a tongue moving here and there. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry she tui 蛇蛻： 味咸，平。主小兒 百二十種驚癇，瘈瘲，癲疾，寒熱，腸痔，蟲毒，蛇癇 , “Its flavor is salty, balanced. It controls 120 types of fright epilepsy in children, convulsion, ailments of peak-illness, alternating sensations of cold and heat, intestinal piles, poison of bugs/worms, and snake epilepsy ”.
